name: Ship Repair
description:
Welcome to your first shift in the Engine Room! Control with WASD, click to pick up tools and right click to throw what's in your hand.

This is my first game and big thanks to Madeline and Adam for helping me when I procrastinated.

Music:

Whiskey on the Mississippi by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4624-whiskey-on-the-mississippi
